post_title: FS - Two graded T206's with off backs.
post_content:
For Sale -

T206 Doc Crandall Portrait, With Cap, Tolstoi - SGC 3  $225 venmo no fee or $232.50 pp gs.

T206 Ed Konetchy, Glove Near Ground, Old Mill - SGC 3  $180 venmo no fee or $186 pp gs.

Prices include shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Bob I.  Note: NC residents please add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover ST.
